name: Yu Zhuang
content: Yu Zhuang, Ph.D. | Faculty | Department of Computer Science | TTU Texas Tech University Texas Tech Whitacre College of Engineering Department of Computer Science Faculty Yu Zhuang, Ph.D. Professor and Associate Chair, ABET Coordinator CS Email: yu.zhuang@ttu.edu Phone: 806.834.7753 Fax: 806.742.3519 Office: EC 211G Mailing Address: Texas Tech UniversityDepartment of Computer ScienceBox 43104Lubbock, TX 79409−3104 Research Group Website:http://www.myweb.ttu.edu/yzhuang/ Research Interests IoT security, Physical Unclonable Functions (PUFs) High-dimensional data modeling, application to semiclassical dynamics Machine learning, application to security vulnerability study of PUFs High performance scientific computing Personal Information Curriculum Vitae Education Ph.D., Mathematics, Louisiana State University, (2000) Ph.D., Computer Science, Louisiana State University, (2000) M.S., () B.S., () Department of Computer Science Like Department of Computer Science on FacebookLike Department of Computer Science on Facebook Follow Department of Computer Science on InstagramFollow Department of Computer Science on Instagram Connect with Department of Computer Science on LinkedInConnect with Department of Computer Science on LinkedIn Address Texas Tech University, Box 43104 | Lubbock, TX 79409-3104 Phone 806.742.3527 Email cs@ttu.edu © 2025 Texas Tech University Aug 31, 2025 11:03 AM
